title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - AIRAC cycles - explanation & updating
description:
In this video we are going to discuss AIRAC cycles. We start with discussing what AIRAC cycles do include and after that have a look at their schedule and explain the importance of updating the AIRAC cycle to the latest version. As last part of the video we will have a quick look at 4 freeware flight planning tools which you can use in Flight Simulator 2020. Detailed videos about these tools will be published in the near future on this channel.

0:00 intro
0:10 what is AIRAC
2:18 AIRAC cycles and distribution process
8:28 updating the AIRAC data
9:27 freeware flight planning tools

Links to freeware flight planning tools:

Simbrief: https://www.simbrief.com/home/
LittleNavMap: https://littlenavmap.org
FltPlan: https://www.fltplan.com/
LetsFly: https://flightsim.to/file/6146/letsfly
